a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The funding given by each donor group to the Global Polio Eradication Initiative. This data is expressed in US
Data source: Global Polio Eradication Initiative (2023); Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
Note: This data is expressed in constant 2021 US$.
